metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7919 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Go before 1.12.16 and 1.13.x before 1.13.7 (and the crypto/cryptobytepackage before 0.0.0-20200124225646-8b5121be2f68 for Go) allows attacks onclients (resulting in a panic) via a malformed X.509 certificate.

criterions.comment: golang-1.10 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
golang-1.13: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
